resources.string:
"Are you new to Toronto?

Do you have an insatiable palate that cannot be satisfied by plebeian grub?

Do you have an unquenchable thirst for juicies to seep through your dark cavities?

If you answered yes to any of the questions above, you are in the right place ♪♪ ヽ(ˇ∀ˇ )ゞ!

This application will show you a list of restaurants found in Toronto, ON, Canada, based upon the type of cuisine you select on the next screen.

Now that we have your attention, let us begin without further ado!"
